attributes.action: Death penalty for all Paedophile’s Rapists and Murderers.
attributes.additional_details:
With something like this you need to think long term 50 to 100 years. 

Porn sites online are promoting this behaviour so this goes allot deeper when you look at human behaviour and these owners also need to be dealt with. This kind of role play promotes the release of dopamine and negative behaviour in people until they can no longer get that fix then it becomes chronic. It stops NOW.
attributes.background: You wouldn’t invite a paedophile rapist or murderer for dinner with your family so why are they alive in society.
